title.narrative: Procurement of services to undertake land certification and adminstration, facilitate economic empowerment activities and cross cutting policy work

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of services to undertake land certification and adminstration, facilitate economic empowerment activities and cross cutting policy work) is a component of Land Investment For Transformation (LIFT) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £42,697,528. This component benefits Ethiopia, and works in the following sector(s): Social Protection, Agricultural development, Agricultural land resources, Environmental policy and administrative management, Rural development. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe. The start date is 11-03-2014 and the end date is 31-07-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
